description: TAMOS ain't Marketing Or Sales! It's an archiving tool for exposing hidden gems to the rightful owners. TAMOS is a minimal, open protocol for publishing and discovering resources (“gems”) without marketing, manipulation, or algorithmic gate-keeping. Because what matters most isn't the popularity of a link, but its inherent value to the individual. It is leveraged by the power of AI crawling and personal recommendation.
author: ruanfh
